template <typename T>
void scanint(T &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

ll a[500000],b[500000];
int main()
{
    //inputfile();
    int t;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanint(n);
        F(i,0,n)
        scanint(a[i]);
        F(i,0,n)
        scanint(b[i]);
        ll d;
        scanint(d);
 
        ll n1,timee,ind,cnt;
        F(i,0,n)
        {
            if(a[i]>=d)
                timee=d;
            else
            {n1 = (d-a[i])/(a[i]-b[i]);
            if( ((d-a[i])%(a[i]-b[i])) > 0)
                ++n1;
            timee = n1*(a[i]+b[i]) +d -n1*(a[i]-b[i]);
            }
            //cout<<"time : "<<timee<<endl;
            if(i==0)
            {
                cnt = timee;
                ind=i+1;
                continue;
            }
                    if(cnt>timee)
            {
                cnt=timee;
                ind=i+1;
            }
 
        }
        //printf("%lld ",cnt );
        printf("%lld\n",ind);
    }
    return 0;
}
